text: Ishaya Iko Ibrahim (born 19 September 1952) is the 18th Chief of the Nigerian Naval Staff. He was flag officer commanding Naval training command and Naval western command before his appointment as Chief of Naval Staff in August 2008. ==Background and early life== Admiral Ibrahim was born in Jaba local government in Kaduna State. He spent and grew up in Kwoi where he had his primary education. He finished his secondary education in S.I.M Secondary School in Kagoro. He Joined the army as a member of the 14th regular course. ==Career== Admiral Ibrahim served on board several ships, He was the deputy defence attaché in Cotonou, Republic of Benin. ==Personal life== Admiral Ibrahim is Married to Mrs Grace Ibrahim and they have six children. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Chiefs of Naval Staff (Nigeria) Category:Living people Category:People from Kaduna State
title: Ishaya Ibrahim
